eeta hethu kihipayakma thibuni.17 wasaraka eksath jathika pakshaye palanaya gana podu janathawa yam kalakirimaka sitiyath eya prakasha kirimata owunta awasthawak nowiya. 1988 – 89 kalayedi janatha wimukthi peramuna dewani sannaddha aragalaya aarambha kirimath eya palanaya kirimata eda eksath jathika paksha aanduwa genagiya dadi mardanakari piliwethath nisa athi wu dadi bhishanakari thaththwayen podu janathawa dadi lesa asarana thaththwayata pathwuha.ema bhishanakari thaththwayen midi nawa palanayak athi karaganimata janathawata awashya wu athara ee sandaha janathawa pelagaswimata nobiyawa idiripath wuye mahinda rajapaksha mahatha pramukha itha sulu pirisak pamani.dakunu palath sabhawe fransisku siduwimada ekala samajaye dadi awadhanayak yomu kerunu siduwimak wiya.1993 wasaren pasuwa dakunu palath sabhawata mathiwarana dekak pawathwimata sidu wuye fransisku siddhiyath samangini.
